slots.name: duration
slots.question: When did the chest pain start?

slots.name: onset
slots.question: Did it start suddenly or gradually?

slots.name: nature
slots.question: What does it feel like — pressure, stabbing, burning, or tightness?

slots.name: location
slots.question: Where exactly is the pain? Can you point to it?

slots.name: radiation
slots.question: Does it spread to your jaw, arm, or back?

slots.name: severity
slots.question: On a scale of 1–10, how severe is it?

slots.name: associated
slots.question: Any shortness of breath, sweating, nausea, palpitations, or dizziness?

slots.name: triggers
slots.question: Did it occur with exertion, at rest, or during stress?

slots.name: relieving
slots.question: Does anything make it better or worse?

slots.name: risk_factors
slots.question: Do you have hypertension, diabetes, high cholesterol, do you smoke, or family heart disease?

slots.name: age_group
slots.question: What is your age group: 18–40, 41–64, or 65+?

redFlagRules.name: cardiac_risk_factors
redFlagRules.if: risk_factors includes 'diabetes' || risk_factors includes 'hypertension' || risk_factors includes 'smoking'

redFlagRules.name: elderly_significant_pain
redFlagRules.message: Older age with significant chest pain.
